articles.description: According to reports quoting the latest study, it was found that taking afternoon naps helps in improving mental agility. It helps with better locational awareness, verbal fluency, and working memory.
articles.content:
• Afternoon naps are known to have a few health benefits
  • As per recent research, afternoon naps can help improve mental readiness
  • However, napping for too … [+4111 chars]

articles.title: What happens if you miss your second COVID-19 vaccine dose? - KENS 5: Your San Antonio News Source
articles.description: Both the Moderna and Pfizer vaccines require a second dose to be fully effective. But what happens if you don't get it, or if your dose gets delayed?
